1 tablet (220 mg) by mouth every 12 hours as needed
Influenza virus antigen only vaccine product

Depression screening using Patient Health Questionnaire Two-Item score (procedure)

ul.li: Achieve LDL cholesterol below 70 mg/dL to reduce cardiovascular risk.
Maintain total cholesterol below 200 mg/dL.
Maintain HDL cholesterol above 40 mg/dL.
Maintain triglycerides below 150 mg/dL.
Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mm[Hg] through lifestyle modifications.
Limit daily sodium intake to less than 2.3 g to support blood pressure control.
Engage in at least 150 minutes of moderate-intensity aerobic physical activity per week.
Achieve a 5% reduction in body weight from baseline.
Limit alcohol consumption to no more than 2 standard drinks per day.
Reduce knee pain severity to a tolerable level to improve mobility and quality of life.
Increase ability to walk and perform daily activities without significant limitation from knee osteoarthritis.
Patient will perform prescribed knee strengthening and flexibility exercises at least 5 days per week.
Achieve and maintain Hemoglobin A1c below prediabetes threshold through lifestyle modification.
Achieve and maintain a healthy body weight to reduce risk of progression to diabetes.
Maintain blood pressure below 130/80 mmHg as part of diabetes risk reduction.
Maintain LDL cholesterol below 100 mg/dL to reduce cardiovascular risk.
